ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.13.* *_cp313

about.description:
This provides the first general-purpose implementation of a
SMIRKS Native Open Force Field (SMIRNOFF) created by the
Open Force Field Initiative.
about.summary: A general small molecule force field descended from AMBER99 and parm@Frosst

about.description:
This provides the first general-purpose implementation of a
SMIRKS Native Open Force Field (SMIRNOFF) created by the
Open Force Field Initiative.
about.summary: A general small molecule force field descended from AMBER99 and parm@Frosst

name: smirnoff99frosst
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "smirnoff99frosst" %}
{% set version = "1.1.0.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/openforcefield/smirnoff99frosst/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c732e15bcf77bdd6f46c83aa9559339455ce8619d49ea576750773442592ba5a

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps"

requirements:
  host:
    - python =3.9 # Lazy workaround for not replacing SafeConfigParser with ConfigParser in source
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - setuptools

test:
  imports:
    - smirnoff99frosst

about:
  home: https://openforcefield.org/
  license: CC-BY-4.0
  license_family: CC
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A general small molecule force field descended from AMBER99 and parm@Frosst
  description: |
    This provides the first general-purpose implementation of a
    SMIRKS Native Open Force Field (SMIRNOFF) created by the
    Open Force Field Initiative.
  doc_url: https://github.com/openforcefield/smirnoff99frosst
  dev_url: https://github.com/openforcefield/smirnoff99frosst

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jaimergp
    - jchodera
    - j-wags
    - mattwthompson
